Text:
Thanks.I have downloaded a lot of these classic sci fi B movies(known as Schlock) for my amusement and my daughter.
When she goes back to college,her and her friends are planning a "BAD MOVIE SATURDAY NIGHT" as a fun get-together,using these movies.
Keep it up!!

That's so cool..I raised my kids on these as well...=)

Thanks!
This was " Craptastic ! " .. Thanks for this forgettable film! I would rate this film as a four letter word!
